main event: A bright pinkish object, three-quarters the size of the moon, was observed in Santa Susana, California on December 2, 1965.
interesting points: The object had a stationary appearance for a duration of 2 hours., It displayed a zigzag course during observation., The weather was clear at the time of the sighting., There were no other reports from the area at the time of the report., The object was possibly Venus, as per the conclusion.
